00002 #define chistory_h

00010 #include <sstream>
00011 
00058 class CHistory {
00059 
00060   typedef std::map<CNucleus *, std::string> HistoryMap;
00061 
00062   public:
00063 
00067   ~CHistory() {};
00068 
00073   int32_t getHistory(CNucleus *p) {
00074     std::string hist = getHistoryAsString(p).substr(0, maxInt32Len);
00075     std::transform(hist.begin(),
00076         hist.end(),
00077         hist.begin(),
00078         theTranslator
00079         );
00080     std::stringstream ss;
00081     ss << hist;
00082     int32_t iHist;
00083     ss >> iHist;
00084     return iHist;
00085   }
00086 
00091   std::string getHistoryAsString(CNucleus *p) {
00092     HistoryMap::const_iterator iter = theMap.find(p);
00093     if(iter != theMap.end())
00094       return iter->second;
00095     else {
00096       std::cerr << "Unknown CNucleus pointer in HistoryMap" << std::endl;
00097       return 0;
00098     }
00099   }
00100 
00105   CHistory(CNucleus *np) {
00106     evap = CEvap::instance();
00107     maxEvapZ = evap->maxZ;
00108     theMap[np]="";
00109     tagDaughters(np, "");
00110   }
00111 
00112   static const char Evaporation;
00113   static const char EvaporationResidue;
00114   static const char Multifragmentation;
00115   static const char AsymmetricFissionLight;
00116   static const char AsymmetricFissionHeavy;
00117   static const char SymmetricFissionLight;
00118   static const char SymmetricFissionHeavy;
00119   static const char SaddleToScission;
00120   static const char NonStatistical;
00121 
00122   private:
00123   void tagDaughters(CNucleus *n, std::string const &parentHistory);
00124   std::string addToHistory(char steptype, std::string const &prevhist);
00125 
00126   static class HistoryStringToDigitsTranslator {
00127     typedef std::map<char, char> StepMap;
00128     public:
00129       HistoryStringToDigitsTranslator() {
00130         theStepMap[Evaporation] = '1';
00131         theStepMap[EvaporationResidue] = '2';
00132         theStepMap[Multifragmentation] = '3';
00133         theStepMap[AsymmetricFissionLight] = '4';
00134         theStepMap[AsymmetricFissionHeavy] = '5';
00135         theStepMap[SymmetricFissionLight] = '6';
00136         theStepMap[SymmetricFissionHeavy] = '7';
00137         theStepMap[SaddleToScission] = '8';
00138         theStepMap[NonStatistical] = '9';
00139       }
00140       char operator()(char const c);
00141     private:
00142       StepMap theStepMap;
00143   } theTranslator;
00144 
00145   static const int maxInt32Len;
00146   HistoryMap theMap;
00147   int maxEvapZ; 
00148   static CEvap *evap;
00149 };
